name: Fury Turn
description:
Turn-based action game.
Save the scientists! Prevent biological catastrophe! Eat all the burgers on the way!
FEATURES:
- Beautiful and vibrant visuals and animations.
- 23 interesting levels.
- Daily challenges.
- Many characters with their unique abilities.
- Simple, intuitive, and pleasing controls.
- Lots of weapons and unbelievable traps.
- Cunning monsters and bosses.
- And much more!
